about_the_game:
Finding the balance between what is morally right and wrong becomes more challenging when you’re trying to survive after resigning from your job at a corporate company, while also being pulled in conflicting directions by various desires.

As a new indie game developer working on a new romantic visual novel, you need not only to complete the project but also manage your personal relationships with friends. Be supportive, comfort them during tough times, and maybe even spark a passionate romance that could change everything… with consequences you didn’t expect.

To release your game, you’ll need help. With no skills in art, music, or promotion, you’ll have to rely on your friends. But how far will you go to convince them? And what will you offer in return?

Chloe Harper has known Daniel for years, and while she’s developed strong feelings for him, she’s too shy to express them and ruin their friendship. She works in a bistro and wants to show that she’s more than just the “innocent girl” at the bar. Taking on the bistro’s promotion is her chance to prove she can handle real responsibility, and that decision initiates the chain of actions that changes everything in her relationship with not only Daniel, but also her boss John.

Lalana Suriyaporn was born in the United States, but her exotic appearance is inherited from her mother’s Thai heritage. She is a striking young woman with a keen awareness of the power her beauty holds, but her ambitions go far beyond the superficial. Working in a small grocery shop, she dreams big – trying to become a renowned visual artist and also make a name for herself in the modeling world.

Sonia Carter is a woman admired for her elegance, intelligence, and drive, well-known in the interior design world for her impeccable taste and attention to detail. She also happens to be the wife of your best friend, John. Despite your efforts to end things, you are entangled in a secret affair with Sonia, constantly battling between temptation and loyalty to your closest friend. However, Sonia is not one to take no for an answer, making it even harder for you to break free from this toxic relationship.

Erica Miller, the fourth woman, is a stunningly beautiful dentist with an irresistible charm. She takes immense pride in her work, but has a tendency to become too familiar with her favorite patients. As the game progresses, we will see that she continues this approach even if the patient is not entirely comfortable with it. Can you break free from that obsessive relationship without any collateral damages? Or you’re going to sacrifice yourself to keep your friends safe?

The fates of those 4 ladies intertwine during the game, making Daniel the pivotal point of everything. It’s up to you if you will end your relationship with Sonia and stay loyal to John, or maybe become part of his romance with Chloe and do a threesome with them when Sonia isn’t around. Possibly, you could let Lalana seduce and captivate you and do it with her in front of John and Sonia and then let them switch partners? And what about Erica? What kind of kinks sit in her twisted mind?

Gameplay-wise, it’s going to be a mix of adventure games with visual novels. Traveling around the map, discovering new locations, speaking with characters, making serious decisions and enjoying emotionally loaded scenes. No grind, building statistics, repetitive actions. Just pure fun!

Expect a significant visual upgrade in comparison to everything that you’ve seen from our studio before. Spectacular 2k visuals, high-resolution models with a crazy number of details, custom-crafted locations and breathtaking animations, including angles that let you experience the game from the eye of the main character.

content_descriptors.notes: Consensual sexual activities between individuals of different genders, including group encounters involving three or more participants. All depicted with tastefulness and respect.
